pages.text: $(li)The Levitation Stone is very ancient stone that only can be obtained from a trade with a $(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Master Cartograper$(/l).$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding it in your hand to make appear a little cloud on the ground that will show you the path to the $(l:patchouli:structures/castle_in_the_sky)Castle in the Sky$(/l).
$(li)Particles must to be enabled in video configuration to be able to see this cloud on the ground.
